name: cloudflare-full-stack-integration
description: Production-tested integration patterns for connecting React frontends to Cloudflare Worker backends with Hono, Clerk authentication, and D1 databases. Prevents common frontend-backend connection issues, CORS errors, auth token failures, and race conditions.
